definition: A group of people living in a specific area, typically sharing common interests, responsibilities, and governance. It is commonly used to refer to a local administrative unit or municipality, often responsible for providing public services and maintaining local infrastructure.

examples.german: Die Gemeinde hat beschlossen, den Park zu renovieren.
examples.english: The municipality has decided to renovate the park.

examples.german: In unserer Gemeinde gibt es viele Vereine und Organisationen.
examples.english: In our community, there are many clubs and organizations.

examples.german: Die Gemeindeverwaltung ist für die Organisation der öffentlichen Dienstleistungen zuständig.
examples.english: The municipal administration is responsible for organizing public services.

examples.german: Die Gemeinde hat eine neue Schule gebaut, um den steigenden Bedarf an Bildungseinrichtungen zu decken.
examples.english: The community has built a new school to meet the increasing demand for educational facilities.

examples.german: Die Gemeindebewohner sind stolz auf ihre historische Altstadt.
examples.english: The residents of the municipality are proud of their historic old town.
